verses.text: PEA folofola ‘a Sihova kia Mōsese, ‘Oku kei toe ha tā ‘e taha ke u ‘omi kia Felo, pea ki ‘Isipite; hili ia te ne tukuange kimoutolu; ka ne ka tukuange homou kotoa te ne mātu‘aki kapusi kimoutolu mei heni.
Ke ke lea mu‘a ‘i he telinga ‘o e kakai ke nau kole teunga siliva mo teunga koula, ‘a e tangata mei hono kau tangata, mo e fefine mei hono kau fefine.

Pea na‘e tuku ‘e Sihova ke ‘ofeina ‘a e kakai ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kau ‘Isipite. Koe‘uhi ko e tangata ko Mōsese na‘a ne mā‘olunga ‘aupito ‘i he fonua ko ‘Isipite, ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e kau tamaio‘eiki ‘a Felo, pea mo e ‘ao ‘o e kakai.
Pea fakahā ‘e Mōsese, Ko eni ‘a e folofola ‘a Sihova, ‘I he tu‘uapō te u ‘alu atu ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o ‘Isipite:

pea ‘e mate ‘a e ‘uluaki tama kotoa pē ‘i he fonua ko ‘Isipite, ‘o fai mei he ‘uluaki tama ‘a Felo ‘oku ‘afio ‘i hono taloni, ‘o a‘u ki he ‘uluaki tama ‘a e kaunanga ‘oku nofo mei he tu‘a me‘a momosi; pea mo e ‘uluaki tama kotoa pē ‘a e fanga manu.
Pea ‘e ai ha fu‘u tangi ‘i he feitu‘u kotoa pē ‘o ‘Isipite, ‘a ia kuo te‘eki hano tatau, pea ‘e ‘ikai toe ai hano tatau.
Ka ‘e ‘ikai ue‘i ‘e ha kulī hono ‘elelo ki ha taha ‘o ha‘a ‘Isileli, ki he kakai pe ki he manu; koe‘uhi ke mou ‘ilo ‘oku vahe‘i ‘e Sihova ‘a e kakai ‘Isipite mei he kakai ‘Isileli.

Pea ko kinautolu ni kotoa pē ko ho‘o kau tamaio‘eiki te nau ‘alu hifo kiate au, pea te nau hū kiate au, ‘o pehē, ‘Alu atu koe, mo e kakai kotoa ‘oku fakaongo kiate koe; pea hili ia te u toki ‘alu atu. Pea ne hū kitu‘a meia Felo kuo lili.
Pea na‘e folofola ‘a Sihova kia Mōsese, ‘o pehē, ‘E ‘ikai tokanga ‘a Felo kiate kimoua; koe‘uhi koe fakalahi ‘eku ngaahi mana ‘i he fonua ko ‘Isipite.
Pea na‘e fai ‘e Mōsese mo ‘Ēlone ‘a e ngaahi mana ko ia kotoa pē ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Felo, ka ka fakafefeka ‘e Sihova ‘a e loto ‘o Felo, pea na‘e ‘ikai te ne tukuange ‘a ha‘a ‘Isileli mei hono fonua.
